recipesJson.name: Hazelnut RY4 | DEVELOPED
recipesJson.author: Developed
recipesJson.description:
This recipe was submitted by Slushy for You Vote, We Mix.  He wanted a Hazelnut, Caramel, Vanilla Cream, Brown Sugar, Tobacco, and that's exactly what he got.  It is mostly a dessert tobacco, mild but very saturated with brown sugars, hazelnut, and vanilla cream.  If you want a more bold tobacco, we suggest adding a bit of FLV Sweet and Smoky, or FLV Red Burley.  See the full Episode and flavor notes at https://youtu.be/FOaUQGHf3Xg  .

This is a collaborative creation by DEVELOPED: NaChef, Max Savage, and Folkart.
Our weekly episodes are released at 6:00pm EST every other Tuesday, and catch our live shows every Thursday at 6pm EST.

Check out our website at https://www.DevelopedDIY.com - We now have Merch!
Find us on YouTube https://www.youtube.com/c/DevelopedDIY
Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/developeddiy/
Check out our FaceBook Page at https://www.facebook.com/developeddiy/

![Legacy](https://imgur.com/LA0lhIG.png)

reviews.text: I don't think I can ever use another sweetener with a tobacco again. This is awesome. The sweetener doesn't touch the tobacco like others do (which it shouldn't imo) but the creams and hazelnut are sweetened right where they should be. I also love what VT vanilla cream is doing in here. I may try adding in that new VT Sahara tobacco, it smells like something that would work in here. its very similar to inw 555 so I think it could push the hazelnut a little more. Vaping this in a Kayfun.
